_header: Christ made man in this manner of wise
_description: ‘Quid ultra debuit facere’ — nine quatrains (aaaa) and burden: ‘Quid vltra debuit facere / That lorde that dyed for the & me’

BodAsh189.First Lines:
Cryste made man yn þis maner of wyselyke vnto þe trynite
                    he deyd þe dewyse…
BodAsh189.Last Lines:
…by merytes of hys passyoun browȝt þe to feliciteto
                    þis forseyde questyoun An Awnswere nowe geve me
BodAsh189.Editions:
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 228; 1977, 202-3.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 162-4.
